column1: #text=Sunday , my husband and I did our grocery shopping .
#text=He had a shopping list recorded in his cell phone .
#text=We arrived at the store in the early afternoon , and the first thing we did was get a shopping cart .
#text=We walked in and went to the produce area first , where all the fruit and vegetables are .
#text=We only had bananas on the list , but I said we should get things for salad , too , so he picked out bananas and bell peppers while I got lettuce and radishes and tomatoes .
#text=Then we went to the deli area and ordered some sliced turkey .
#text=The man behind the counter sliced the turkey for us and measured it on a scale to give us the amount we wanted , then wrapped it up for us .
#text=Next we visited the bakery area and picked out a nice loaf of rye bread to put the turkey on .
#text=In the canned goods area , we picked out soup and white beans ; then we went to the pasta area to get pasta and sauce .
#text=In the meat area , we picked up some chicken breasts and Italian sausage .
#text=Then we went to the dairy refrigerators and we each picked out some flavors of yogurt we like , and got milk and butter and eggs .
#text=We were nearly done , so my husband checked the list again and we saw we had forgotten tin foil and toilet paper , so we went back and got those two things .
#text=Then we went to the check-out where we put all our groceries on a conveyor belt and the clerk scanned each item in an electronic scanner to find out what it cost .
#text=She told us the total , and I swiped my bank card through an electronic reader to pay .
#text=Meanwhile , a bagger was putting our groceries into re-usable shopping bags that we had brought with us .
#text=He put the bags back into the cart .
#text=We got a receipt from the clerk and pushed the cart out to our car , where we moved the bags into the back seat .
#text=Then my husband put the cart in little corral in the parking lot that keeps the carts away from people 's cars , and we got in our car and went home .
